content.detailedDescription:
Date for sighting is between 2009-2011 and aprox between the time 22:15-23:00 (stockholm time).

was on my way home from my job in vimmerby and when i went past the hultsfred airfield, i saw some kind of craft that stood still a bit in the air above the airfield. was curious and decided to take me a little closer, then turned onto the road up to the control tower and turned the car at the tower.

i saw a black oval object (figure 1) hanging a few meters above the ground, only about 100 meters from my position. the color was black, matte, reflected very little ambient light and was about 10 meters in diameter. the lighting in the area of the object was in was poor. no traffic at the airport, no activity in the tower. i think the airport was disused at this time. no sound was heard. i observed this for about three minutes and did not arrive at what it could be. i continued to go home to målilla.

i'm going out on the road 34, and run past the first roundabout after the airport and when i look in the rearview mirror so fly something black, shaped like a cone with the apex downwards and two green flashing light on the edges (figure 2) past the roundabout straight across the road i travel and only about 150-200 meters behind me.

during the rest of the journey, i see nothing strange. once i arrive in målilla and drive towards the center, so i look to my surprise another similar object or perhaps the same that crossed the roundabout in hultsfred now fly about 50 feet in the air and follows roughly road 34 in a southerly direction ( figure 2), the rate was estimated at about 30-40 meters per second.
content.summary: Ufo hovered above ground 100 meters from me

content.detailedDescription: When i was going to my tuition in south kolkata(india) i suddenly noticed a green light high in the sw direction it diameter was about 6-13 meters,when i saw this i understood that it was something like a ufo as i had saw something like that before but this time this different as this was spherical than triangle like i had saw before it emit green light then suddenly it flashed like a explosion and suddenly went away from me but it looked like it was falling at a slow speed it left a trail of green light.I don't know what was that but it looked like a ufo.I want to know what was that....So please help me by solving this report
content.summary: The ufo was first stationary it was emiting green aura like light and suddenly fell slowly and went away from me with a big flash or explosion of green light

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
-i apologize for the cursing in the videos, i tend to curse when i get excited about things, and this mass ufo sighting was unlike anything i've ever seen on youtube.-

this happened during st. patricks day so i'm going to start first by saying my girlfriend and i were both sober the entire night. 

my girlfriend and i were sitting on the couch watching gravity falls together. i turned my head and saw about 8 red lights connected to a flying saucer-type ufo. it had 2 white lights on the bottom of it. this first ufo hovered directly over our apartment building, over the parking lot, and behind the building across the lot. we got up and watched it, thinking it might be a helicopter at first, but it was not. we ran outside, chased it behind the building, and in under 2 minutes it was over a mile away. this ufo was about 250+ feet long and about 80 feet tall. 

after observing this ufo flying away we noticed about 3 red and white blinking lights, all in separate directions. after a few seconds of watching them, we began moving to observe them closer. we began noticing more and more, until we saw about 8 different ufos. a couple flew over us and we noticed they were black triangle ufos. they flew over about a minute apart from one another.

after seeing those triangle ufos and observing 8 different ufo, red and white blinking lights, we tried getting closer to one that was moving towards us. as we got closer and got a decent video of it, a black military helicopter flew right by us.
(here is the interesting thing. i called 911, and reported these ufos in my area. about 30 minutes later the faa(federal ariel administration) contacted me and began asking me questions about what i was seeing. he talked with the pilot of the helicopter that flew by us, and funny enough the pilot told him he didn't see a thing. we have video of his helicopter in the same frame as the triangle ufo, within a few hundred feet of each other.)

after the black helicopter flew by we moved again to see another triangle ufo fly closer to the ground, like 200 feet above the ground. at this point i ran ahead of my girlfriend and ended up getting separated trying to keep up with the ufo that was flying right over the woods. after watching several other red/white blinking lights fly around in different directions i started trying to follow the ones closer to me to get the best videos i could.

at this point i ran into two guys smoking on their balcony in the apartment complex my girlfriend lives in. they asked me if i saw the ufos and the flying triangles, i said yes. we even talked about the black helicopter with green lights. a few minutes later another ufo descended and and flew past the woods, so i split from those guys and started chasing it to get a better video, but it was too fast and i just got a couple lights behind the trees.

after running around for near 40 minutes i met back up with my girlfriend. we went inside and stood on her balcony and watched 15+ red/white blinking ufos in the distance. a few minutes of watching them from a distance a few of them flew over us.

one of the ones that flew over us had 3 red lights in a triangle pattern, and a white light in the back forming a diamond shape. this was the only diamond shape we saw.

my girlfriend started getting cold so she went inside. as i was watching a red/white flashing ufo triangle a mile away, a grey/silver disk about 30ft wide and 15ft high zipped between me and the ufo i was watching. this disk was about 150 feet off the ground and about 100ft away from me. i only caught it for a split second and it didn't have any lights on it.

i got a call from the faa, but my phone dropped the call mid-conversation. so i called him back on my girlfriends phone. i explained to him everything we witnessed and assured him i'd send him emails with these videos. he said there was a similar case that happened in reed, michigan a little earlier, which is why he called me asap. as i was talking to him i saw a bright white streak across the sky, about as wide as a basketball at arms-length for a split second. this was unlike a sattelite entering the atmosphere or a shooting star/meteor. i've seen them before and it was unlike anything i'd ever seen.

this is the video from reed, michigan, posted on mufon earlier this night.

http://www.Mufoncms.Com/files_jeud8334j/64011_submitter_file1__trim.E07b0fd9a61e4f5898b6a20746327c5b.Mov

my girlfriend brought a blanket and binoculars out and we ended up watching the ufos fly north and south, right past each other. they were about 150ft above/below one another, flying in opposite directions. they did this 3 or 4 times before they flew out of sight.

i noticed a bright white light, the size of an asprin straight across from our balcony, a mile out. at first i thought it was a ufo, but it didn't blink or move, and gave off the same light as a star. my girlfriend convinced me it was a star so after the ufos stopped showing up we went inside and i started checking out all of the videos. about 30 minutes later i glanced out the window and the star i thought was a ufo was completely gone, as if it had not been there. this was a completely cloudless night by the way.

a few hours later(3am michigan/ohio time) i showed the videos to my friend in ohio over skype. she looked out her window and witnessed 3-4 of the same red/white blinking objects flying in the distance, and one of her friends took a photo of them.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 20+ triangles, 2 flying saucers, military helicopter, and white streak across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Keep in mind i'm reporting what i saw but i don't know what that was/is. on february 10, 2015 when i was walking up the end of my driveway after getting the mail from the box, i glanced up at the beautiful, cloudless sky and a flutter grabbed my attention. insects were flying high above me and the sunlight was shining through their wings making them look like sparkling tinkerbells. i wanted to watch them longer but the sun was too bright. then i realized if i stood in the shadow of the utility pole close to the end of the driveway, i could use it to block out the sun and enjoy the sight a bit longer. i stood there for about 30 seconds or so when another movement caught my eye. it was close to the sun and looked like a white crescent cloud, but it wasn't a cloud and was cupped toward the sun. it went straight into the sun and was gone. it only lasted a second or two. a few seconds later another appeared, the same shape though a tiny bit larger, moving at the same speed but from another angle and it too disappeared into the sun. then a third appeared about 10 seconds later and was about the same size as the first. their length was roughly about one fifth compared to the diameter of the sun. what held my attention was the fact that they were going into the sun and not away from it. i watched for about 10 minutes and saw about a dozen of these things. have no idea what they are. they didn't look anything like the insects still fluttering several yards away from the utility pole. went out earlier the next day, but didn't see any. i am going out again in a few minutes and have another look. absolutely incredible to me. as of now, march 18, 2015, have not seen crescents again.  have not had a day with as clear sky as that day. am curious to know if anyone else has ever seen this phenomena. my android phone camera couldn't overcome the brightness of the sun and couldn't capture what i saw.
content.summary: White, cloud like crescents zooming into sun

content.detailedDescription: Outside smoking and saw the craft. saw craft fade in and out with blue flashing lights with at least 5 or more on exterior of craft. changed potions several times shooting diagonal up down and sideways. lights appeared to be in some type of 3d triangle shape.
content.summary: Saw fading and flashing lights over blue white tank mountains.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok the thing that makes this so very interesting is there were two planes in the sky a beach bonanza v tail coming from the north headed to the south i was facing east looking almost straight up i would guess it had to be around 8 thousand feet the elevation where is was is like 3500ft the bonanza had to be going around 200 knots and right from behind me a black or charcoal grey business jet flew heading east right over top the beechcraft about a thousand feet higher it looked to be 1 an 1/3 larger than the smaller craft... ok here's is the part that blows my mind... 1. there were contrails all over the sky but the jet left none. 2. it made no sound at all and i waited and waited to hear it, the jet was moving 500-600 mph.  3. it just disappeared  about 1000 feet past the smaller craft, gone!!!!! 

my father flew jets for a living i have ridden in more than a few not making this up i was not drunk i do not drink or take drugs...  i checked on the internet an no one has seen what i saw....  i was in the high desert it could be something from skunk works some cloaking tech... but no sound either? anyway keep your eyes out for something new.
content.summary: Dark grey  business jet. smaller than a gulfstream maybe 2/3 rds the size

content.detailedDescription: Thought it was a plane with headlight on, then it started moving fast and a blue aura appeared in front io it and it went into the light and was gone i kept looking to see if i could see anything more. clear night was walking dog. it was oval with a black spot to one side and then the blue aura happened in front split second it was gone.
content.summary: Thought it was a plane with headlight on, then it started moving fast and a blue aura appeared in front io it and it went into the light and was gone.

content.detailedDescription: Outside with my wife and daughter - daughter said "look a ufo" - when i turned i saw an orangeish glowing item going from the west toward nw to north.  i attempted to get a picture, but orb moving at a high-rate of speed.   looked as if it turned north then dimmed out.  first time i have seen anything like this in this area.
content.summary: Orange orb in peoria, az

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were outside and saw a bright light in the sky. we watched it ans several smaller lights came out of it. they had blinking colors and one flew directly over us and we were able to see a round object with three white lights and a red flashing light. they made little to no noise except the close up one and it made  a bit of a swishing noise. they are still in the sky as i write this and are continuously circling the sky. at first i thought they were just stars. i feel anxious right now and was excited while i watched it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Several ships

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car when i noticed three moving lights out of the corner of my eye. noticing their apparent speed, lack of a tail, and lack of emission noises, i immediately grabbed my phone to take a video, in which i described everything i saw. in the middle of shooting the video, two additional lights appeared, separated by about thirty seconds, each moving more quickly than the original three. i thought they could be aircraft, but i heard no engine noises. i thought they could be meteors, but they didn't have tails. while i'm sure there are other logical explanations, i felt it necessary to report on the basis of being an "unidentified flying object".
content.summary: Five fast lights moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Spherical white object moves from north to south. i watched this from my balkony. the object pulsates in 10-second intervalls. the whole observation lasts about a minute.
content.summary: Pulsating light flies in a straight path

content.detailedDescription: Star-like object that first stood completely still, then all of a sudden lit up like a magnesium flare and took off in a tremendous high speed 45 degrees up in the space.
content.summary: Star-like object shot off in high speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was a passenger in a vehicle driving home along route 47 at about 2 pm on a clear day when i noticed what i thought was a white remote control airplane coming from a farm field in the distance from the left. i pointed it out to the driver and said, "look at that remote control plane". that's when he said, "no that is too big to be a model plane."
i thought it was a remote control plane by the way it was flying. by that time it was making a pass from the left field to the road we were on, but still ahead of us. this is also when i came to the realization that the plane was indeed too big to be a model, too high up and too fast. then the biplane hovered over the road and turned into what looked like a crop duster. i said to the driver, "did you see that?!?" and he "said yea it looks like a crop duster". at this point im thinking this is impossible, but i just confirmed what i saw. the road had no cars on it ahead of us at the time so the driver could watch this plane or whatever it was with me. im thinking the whole time take out your camera phone. tell him to pull over, but all we bot could do was watch. next the plane took off over the farm field to the right of us made a slight turn and did the second impossible thing. it disappeared. not in a flash of light, or went supersonic, it was just there and then not. before either of us could verbally react it reappeared as a small jet facing the way it was trying to turn. the way it was flying made me make a joke, "hey that plane now reminds me of my jet in gtav", a video game i play. it was flying back over the road, made an impossibly tight turn over the left field back over to the road again. it was not going particularly fast, that's why we had such a good view, it was also completely silent. yes we had the windows open, and the radio off. then it made a sharp turn in the right side field. at his point im thinking there is no plane i have seen, in real life or on tv that can maneuver better than my video game jet. i commented on this and the driver agreed. he was in disbelief too that a plane could move like that. the last thing it did was fly back over across the road to the left field and hover as a helicopter would. no it did not morph into a hover craft to land. it stayed looking the same white jet that it had last morphed into. at that point on the road we were aside it. it was about 1/4 mile away the last position i saw it in was hovering about 50 feet from the ground. there was no dust, or debris being kicked up whatsoever. then a small tree line was in the way as we passed. i looked back for the plane, but nothing was there.
being in the moment we discussed it a bit. as i said its disbelief and i was trying to find every logical answer as to what it could be. we actually did not talk about it for a whole day just to see if we came up with the same story a day later. we did. this is when i decided to report my sighting. i was not alone. it was in bright daylight. we both saw the aircraft. i still can not explain what i saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Morphing white biplane,crop duster, then small jet

content.detailedDescription: I was on the way home from dropping my girlfriend home late at night at about 23:45 and all quiet, no cars outside no people nothing. i was about to cross the road to go home to my flat when first i looked up in the sky in this same direction i always look in, for 2 reasons, i love the orion constellation and where i am i get too see it quite often so i am always looking for it, the second reason is because i have had 2 previous sightings in this same area just as weird as this one. so i noticed the strange light because it was not moving, it looked pure red with a reddish glow and was round and about 6 ft wide and 6 ft tall. i stayed still looking at it to see if it was just a star not moving or the movement of the clouds eluding me. then about 20 seconds after the stare off it suddenly started moving at about 10 miles per hour and i was standing still trying to make out if it was a plane or one of these ufos i have seen in the past. it was not high up at all maybe about 150 ft.And this circle ball of light moved across the road next to the building i live in, so i decided to follow it and get as close as possible and forgetting to mention the whole experience there was no sound emitted. so i was walking to try and get underneath it while it was still stationary and as i was walking i got on the phone to my girlfriend and i got under some trees and could faintly see it and when i got out from underneath the tree i looked up and i see approximately 5 of the same balls of light in a complete small circle i stood and looked up in shock and after about 3 seconds they literally just vanished from the sky as if they had a switch to turn the lights off. i waited around 10 minuets but the sky remained clear.
content.summary: Was coming home late at night when i noticed a strange light hovering above apartments across the road from where i live, i followed it and it somehow turned into about 5 of the same thing i just saw

content.detailedDescription:
Wednesday march 4th. clear blues skies, windy, blowing north, west hollywood sitting on balcony working. i see helicopters, commercial, private planes, blimps, all the time. 4:00pm two large green military helicopters fly almost directly above me from the east heading west. unusual to see those... 4:10pm looking south, at first i thought it was a commercial plane with the suns reflection beaming off it, as it was pretty much in the same path as i usually see plans, i watched it move slowly east. it shape shifted into a ball, still emitting a bright light, then stopped, floated up, so now i'm thinking aluminum balloons reflecting the sun?, then it went flat, cigar shape and started spinning, then into a ball, then split into two. one floated up, one floated down, then east again. the one floating up stopped, then traveled east. i lost sight when my view was blocked by my building. i took about 15 pics with my phone. not the best camera and i couldn't see anything when i looked back and zoomed in.  i have sent the pics forward to a mufon investigator. a little time after seeing the orb, and i can't remember how long, another military helicopter flew over in the same route and the previous two. i took a pic... 5:08pm another orb turned up. same position as the first. i only saw this one for about 10 seconds before it vanished... 4th military helicopter this time in a different direction... it came from the same location as the previous helicopters, but this time heading south west in the direction from where the orbs appeared at first sight... i took a pic.
during these times i had seen other helicopters and planes, the normal activity, and also the commercial planes that travel the path almost the same as the orbs, and i noted the planes were dark, not reflecting any light.
it was also hard to really tell altitude, size, and speed.

side note... a friend in del mar, ca... she and her mom have told me they always see orbs over the water, and have had contact.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Single glowing orb west los angeles heading east slowly changing shape, altitude, direction, splits into two. military helicopters appear.

content.detailedDescription: J'ã©tait dans ma chambre et je scruttait le ciel soudain je vis un objet , j'ai d'abbord cru a un avion mais la vittesse a laquelle vont les avion ã  cette altitude ã©tait trop rapide . j'ai ã©tait chercher mon frã©re qui ma confirmã© que la vittesse ã©tait trop grande . alors soudain il me rã©pond que les lumiã©res ã©tait diffã©rente car les avion de ligne on deux lumiere rouge clignotante  alors que l'objet en question avait bien deux lumiere rouge mais ces derniere ne clignotait pas et de plus il y avait un spot de couleur balc trã©s puissant qui clignotait au milieu de l'appareil . on la perdu de vue lorsque il est arrivã© au dessus de notre toit puisque leq fenãªtre ne permã©tã© pas de continuer a le suivre .
content.summary: On aurai dit un avion mais trop rapide vu l'altitude difference avec les lumiere

content.detailedDescription: I live in the st. louis suburb of kirkwood, missouri.  sunday evening march 15, 2015 at about 8 p.M.  my wife and i were standing in our front yard looking east watching our kids play and enjoying the warm weather when we saw a strange sight in the eastern horizon.  at first we saw what we thought was a plane or helicopter with weird almost pinkish lights that was not blinking like you normally see. it was flying slower than i would expect a jet to fly although we sometimes see them flying slowly getting ready to land at lambert airport.  then several more came into view following the first one. they seemed to be flying more or less in a line all heading the same direction, from south to north, at the same speed across our field of vision. we could see them through the trees because the trees do not have leaves yet.  my wife counted a total of 8.  then before they left our field of vision they all abruptly disappeared at the same time.  just went dark.  they were too far away from me to make out a shape, but my wife thought they were disc like. it only lasted a couple of minutes and i did not have my phone so i did not get any pictures or videos.
content.summary: Saw aircraft, thought it was a commercial plane or helicopter in the eastern horizon.  almost pinkish light - followed by 7 others flying south to north then just disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: In july 1952, washington dc radar blips appeared and jet interceptors sent into area by air force. objects surrounded one jet interceptor and pilot was told to open fire if felt endangered. pilot opened fire on nearest object and hit ufo with gun cannon burst. a piece of object broke off and was recovered by army intelligence when it hit ground directly below dogfight area.  this material was analyzed by dr robert sarbacher dod scientist and said material was composed of magnesium-orthosilicate and embedded every 10 microns with spheres of bismuth. bismuth being the most highly anti-magnetic substance known to man. it appears this served as an insulating device of the hull to keep hull surface from becoming magnetized. it would appear the the huge negative magnetic field generated by the craft; allows it to float in our atmosphere at will by dialing up the field in intensity to rise and lowering it to land. the power supply must be some form of cold nuclear fusion to allow for the extreme acceleration and rates of climb. this was initially reported in frank edwards book flying saucers - serious business in the middle 1960's but was ignored by the press. i think we need to take another look at this book. frank died not too long after publication. george meaney told him to drop the investigations into ufo's and frank did not listen to him. george was head of the american federation of labor and sponsored frank initially.
content.summary: Washington dc ufo flap ; piece shot off by jet interceptor

content.detailedDescription: Having a smoke very late or very early around midnight or thereafter on march 16(17th).  i always look at the stars and try to catch a glimpse of a satellite or shooting star.  i noticed an extremely fast object coming from the south.  it's direction was due north but with rapid altitude adjustments.  before it turned north east it rose at an approximate 30 deg climb.  the shape (best as i could tell) was orbish or oval.  it had a very faint glow like a transparent blue hue.  as for elevation of this thing, i would say unknown due to the fact of it's speed and unknown size. there was no sound.  my best guess as to approximate location of sighting would be in between the sierra nevada range near arvin,heading north to the woody area before turning easterly. but since i have no idea of altitude or size i cannot be sure.  i witnessed this object for maybe 4-5 seconds before it was out of my sight.  this object was faster than anything man made.
content.summary: Very fast low light glowing orb or oval shape.

content.detailedDescription: Orb/disc object with some sort of light on top but i couldn't tell the top lights color for sure it was maybe green. it was flying faster than i've ever seen something fly before. it would make a hundred eighty degree turn and be full speed in a split second. when airplanes turn they make large banking turns, yet this object made precise fluid turns on a dime that would kill a pilot from the g forces if they were flying this object. it made a pattern in the sky like two s's on top of each other while lowering it's altitude and then shot off westbound angled at about a 55 to 60 degree angle towards the sky disappearing in the blink of an eye. the whole sighting last maybe a minute  or less. i first thought it was venus because when i first witnessed it it was just hovering stationary in the sky. then i thought it was just a plane that was moving very slowly on the horizon giving the illusion that it was stationary, but then it started to move very very fast eastbound towards my house. i didn't take out my camera because by the time i realized that it was moving unlike anything i've seen, until the time it disappeared was maybe only 10 15 seconds tops. i was yelling for my fiance to hurry up and get out back so she could witness it as well but it shot off right before she got out back. the strange part is, on march 6th of this year, 10 days ago, i witnessed roughly seven objects in the sky that looked very similar to this. they were the same color yet they left fireball tails behind them almost like a comet. they were in the sky making different patterns, and then all of them either shot off  at an alarming rate of speed or blinked out in succession. so in a matter of 10 days i have had two ufo sightings. a quick google search yielded statements from other people here locally in the peoria arizona area saying they have witnessed very similar objects in the sky over peoria. about a year, to maybe a year and a half ago, my fiance and 2 kids also witnessed something just like this while driving home from her mother's house 4 miles away. i was able to see it after she called me on the phone and told me where to look right before they blinked out as well. it shook her up pretty bad, she thought they were meteors falling to earth until they started moving around doing different patterns and disappeared. this is a definite ufo flap and i think somebody needs to seriously investigate what is going on here.
content.summary: I witnessed an orangish...

content.detailedDescription:
At the time of sighting i was just about to come inside from our enclosed back porch. as i walked past the oversized windows i glanced out to notice what first appeared to be a moving line of stars! within seconds i was able to discern some suggestion of a rounded or wide boomerang shape as it steadily passed further into my field of vision, possibly heading west or wsw.  

the *leading edge* of the object was my only reference point for size and shape of obect as the lights were a little faint/fuzzy like distant stars (though concrete and discernable as a distinct object). i would guess there were easily 2 dozen white lights, seemingly close together, comprising the leading edge.

for whatever reason the body of the object was hazy or simply blended in with the night sky.  unfortunately i had the windows closed with the vent on so had there been any sound associated with the object it was lost on me. 

within a minute or less the object became lost to view due to trees etc. 

my impression was of a fairly large, rounded boomerang or fat bullet shaped craft, but as the body was blurred to me i really cannot say.  i'm also not certain about the actual shape as i was still able to see the lighted front edge as it faded to the west, so not sure what its position relative to my perspective may have actually been.
content.summary: Large object indistinct except for wide curved boomerang front edge outlined by approx 2 dozen stationary dull white lights

content.detailedDescription: I was walking near my home when i first observed it.  i live near the airport and noticed the light color was different from a normal plane. the light was large, bright and stationary.  i was not sure what it was so i watched for about 20 seconds and it did nothing.  it was not a star as it was too low in the horizon.  during this time, i saw no planes land or take off from the airport while i saw it ( it was actually very close to the airport).  i walked back home to grab something and about three minutes later went to the same point i initially saw it and it was still there in the exact same spot.  i tried to record video and take photos with my phone but my phone.  i was able to get one bad video.  i tried again and my phone said no memory was left..  i stood and watched it for a few minutes at the corner and i felt compelled to walk closer to get a look.  it was very far away but i wanted to see if walking in the direction would help.  as i started walking, i could see the outline of a large triangle shape and the light.  not sure if it turned or why i could see an outline cause the light appeared to be in the same place.  i watched it for another minute or two  and it still appeared stationary.  i turned for a second and then it was gone.  i don't know where it went.  i was not paying attention to planes , helicopters, etc until i saw the above question. after the event i did hear a helicopter and about twn minutes or so afterwards, i saw a plane take off at the airport.
content.summary: Large bright light observed and was stationary for at least 10 minutes

content.detailedDescription: My wife was taking sunset pictures, only noticed the object in picture after it was taken,
content.summary: Noticed in picture after it was taken,

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog out i looked up in the sky in the mornings light fast moving from the southwest to the south east. it was moving extremely fast. as i came around the front of my house there was another following it on the exact same path. it made no noise neither made noise more left any type of contrail they disappeared behind the horizon in my field of vision. he had no navigation markers and appeared to have something sticking out of the top of it that was kind of reflecting light. each one crossed my field of vision in less than 20 seconds.
content.summary: Silent fast moving orange light no sound followed by a second, both had something sticking out the top

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the birds & looked at my phone & caught the pictures. my phone just went crazy. i have a clear picture.
content.summary: Dark disc with orange light at top. 2nd ufo was black and shaped like a top hat. the 3rd ufo wasshaped like a short black cylinder

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work and noticed an object with lights above the tree tops. the object was hovering and i turned off another road to get a better view of the object. i stopped in front of the object and viewed the object at 25 ft. away.It was a silver gray object the size of a football field. the object turned lights off and started moving slow, making no sound. i jump back in to the car and moved besides it for at least two miles before it went out of sight. when i got to work i noticed i was one hour late and could not figure out why i was late but i remember every details,details,details. there is a burned mark on my legs and marks on my arms from that sighting.I have more details if you need them.They are real for one thing i know the object was not man made.
content.summary: The object moved very silent for at least two miles.I noticed all detail of craft including the under carriage of the craft, also the rear of the craft, it was very silent.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a walk with my son and we saw a silver tube shaped object in the sky. it made no sound, if flew in a straight line, it passed through some clouds and kept going into the horizon, until it disappeared. we thought at first it was an airplane, but there were no wings and no tail, no sound and it flew slowly. it had no contrails, either. we weren't frightened by it, merely curious.
content.summary: Saw a silver cylinder shaped ufo right below the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
My position was latitude n 33-41-58 w116-18-12, elevation 16 meters 

taking dog out, noticed two bright spots in the clear night sky. one was positioned approximately 22 degrees up, on 240 sw. the other was at 30 degrees 256 w. thought at first it was a space station, and the one at 256 w may be but other object changed colors in blinking lights- red, blue, green and violet all pulsing at different frequencies. neither moved for over an hour, but could tell the movement of the earth. very bright compared to stars. observed through binoculars for more close up view. the objects were above the 6,000 ft mountains surrounding our location. 

the one believed to be the space station appeared to be a rectangular body with reflecting gold light with running lights blinking in red, and green.

two of us witnessed for about an hour and both objects moved to w 280. then we stopped watching.
content.summary: 2 stationary bright objects, one with changing colors, long duration

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a walk with my son and we saw a silver tube shaped object in the sky. it made no sound, if flew in a straight line, it passed through some clouds and kept going into the horizon, until it disappeared. we thought at first it was an airplane, but there were no wings and no tail, no sound and it flew slowly. it had no contrails, either. we weren't frightened by it, merely curious.
content.summary: Saw a silver cylinder shaped ufo right below the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Observed ufo heading west from richmond county, ga. appeared to be over grovetown, which is located in columbia county. ufo was quite bright, with large pulsing white light, with what appeared to be smaller different colored lights surrounding the larger light. ufo was observed for approximately five minutes, ultimately fading behind the tree line as it appeared to continue westward. i attempted to capture a picture, but my cellphone camera was not able to detect the lights due to the distance.
content.summary: Large pulsing light over horizon
